books.author: Nelson DeMille
books.description: A Miami lawyer solicits an Army veteran to go on a secret mission to recover $60 million stashed away in Cuba.
books.title: THE CUBAN AFFAIR

books.author: Stephen King
books.description: The fears of seven teenagers are rekindled in their adult lives by the terrifying title character. Originally published in 1986.
books.title: IT

books.author: James Patterson and James O Born
books.contributor: by James Patterson and James O. Born
books.description: A detective from New York takes his family on a vacation in Maine and is enlisted by local cops to help solve a crime in the woods.
books.title: HAUNTED

books.author: Ken Follett
books.description: The lovers Ned Willard and Margery Fitzgerald find themselves on opposite sides of a conflict between English Catholics and Protestants while Queen Elizabeth fights to maintain her throne.
books.title: A COLUMN OF FIRE

books.author: Jan Karon
books.description: The 14th novel in the Mitford series. Three generations of Kavanaghs face changes in their lives.
books.title: TO BE WHERE YOU ARE

books.author: David Lagercrantz
books.description: Lisbeth Salander teams up with an investigative journalist to uncover the secrets of her childhood. A continuation of Stieg Larsson's Millennium series.
books.title: THE GIRL WHO TAKES AN EYE FOR AN EYE

books.author: John le Carré
books.description: Peter Guillam, formerly of the British Secret Service, is pulled out of retirement to defend intelligence operations during the cold war that resulted in the deaths of people close to him.
books.title: A LEGACY OF SPIES

books.author: Margaret Atwood
books.description: Men and women in a dystopian future. The basis of the Hulu series; originally published in 1985.
books.title: THE HANDMAID'S TALE

books.author: Kyle Mills
books.description: Vince Flynn's character Mitch Rapp leaves the C.I.A. to go on a manhunt when the nephew of a Saudi King finances a terrorist group.
books.title: ENEMY OF THE STATE

books.author: Lisa Wingate
books.description: A South Carolina lawyer, researching her grandmother’s past, learns about a Tennessee orphanage that kidnapped children and placed them for adoption with wealthy people. Based on a real-life scandal.
books.title: BEFORE WE WERE YOURS

books.author: Celeste Ng
books.description: An artist with a mysterious past and a disregard for the status quo upends a quiet town outside Cleveland.
books.title: LITTLE FIRES EVERYWHERE

books.author: Heather Graham
books.description: The F.B.I.'s Krewe of Hunters paranormal team is invited to investigate a death in an Edgar Allan Poe-themed restaurant.
books.title: WICKED DEEDS

books.author: JD Robb
books.description: Lt. Eve Dallas investigates the murder of a professional gossip who dabbled in blackmail; by Nora Roberts, writing pseudonymously.
books.title: SECRETS IN DEATH

books.author: Ruth Ware
books.description: A travel writer on a cruise is certain she has heard a body thrown overboard, but no one believes her.
books.title: THE WOMAN IN CABIN 10

books.author: Gabbie Hanna
books.description: A collection of poems by the YouTube comedian.
books.title: ADULTOLESCENCE

books.author: Hillary Clinton
books.description: The first woman nominated for president by a major political party details her campaign, mistakes she made, outside forces that affected the outcome and how she recovered in its aftermath.
books.title: WHAT HAPPENED

books.author: Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.contributor: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: Major events and battles during the Revolutionary War are told from the perspectives of George Washington, Benjamin Franklin and others.
books.title: KILLING ENGLAND

books.author: Katy Tur
books.description: The NBC News correspondent describes her work covering the 2016 campaign of the Republican nominee for president and his behavior toward her.
books.title: UNBELIEVABLE

books.contributor: by Gucci Mane with Neil Martinez-Belkin
books.description: A memoir by the East Atlanta hip-hop artist, who made a comeback after setbacks that included doing time in a maximum-security federal prison.
books.title: THE AUTOBIOGRAPHY OF GUCCI MANE

books.author: Jeannette Walls
books.description: The author recalls a bizarre childhood. Originally published in 2005 and the basis of the movie.
books.title: THE GLASS CASTLE

books.author: Jonathan Cahn
books.description: Ancient figures from the Middle East are used to explain the rise and fall of contemporary leaders and events.

books.description: The politics and culture of 21st-century America are put in the context of five centuries of historical events and movements, including elements of conspiracy theories, crackpot ideas and hucksterism.
